# Handoff

**Purpose**: Session continuity between AI sessions

## Latest Handoff

See `LATEST.md` for most recent session summary.

## Format

```markdown
# Session Handoff - YYYY-MM-DD

## What Was Done
- [Completed task 1]
- [Completed task 2]

## What's Next
- [Pending task 1]
- [Pending task 2]

## Key Context
- [Important context for next session]
```
